title: Calories in 1 Chicken Drumstick
meta_description: Discover calories in drumstick, including full nutrition breakdown for one roasted chicken drumstick with skin, plus protein, fat, and easy tweaks.
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on chicken drumstick (~75g edible portion), roasted without added oil or breading.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, cooking method, skin removal, and seasonings. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken drumstick with skin provides ~176 kcal and ~18 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken drumstick with skin?
faqs.a: About 176 kcal for one roasted drumstick with skin.
Roughly 111 kcal per roasted skinless drumstick.

faqs.q: How much protein in one drumstick?
faqs.a: Approximately 18 g protein per roasted chicken drumstick with skin.

faqs.q: Does frying increase calories in drumstick?
faqs.a: Yes, frying adds about 100 kcal due to absorbed oil.
Zero carbs or fiber in plain roasted chicken drumstick.
